attributes.action: Broadcasted House of Commons Sports Day
attributes.additional_details: Wouldn't it be nice to see our elected Government slog it out on the 1500m as we all did at school? A traditional sports day would include track events ranging from the 100m dash to the aforementioned 1500m and field events such as long jump, shot put etc. and also team sports.

rejection.details:
Whether a sporting event involving members of parliament should be broadcast is a matter for the Parliamentary authorities. However, the attached article mentions some unbroadcast events which take place:

http://www.parliament.uk/business/publications/parliamentary-archives/archives-highlights/sport-and-parliament/
